title: Dyno-Plumbing typeface ID
content:
hi guys

well, i've identifonted, whatthefonted and trawled through the fontbook catalogue... googled for dyno pdfs to examine the properties... but can't work out on the typeface on this [leaflet](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017091523/http:/www.x1.ltd.uk/brettstuff/dyno.jpg) is...

it's a weird one, double-storey lowercase g, straight descendered lowercase y, compressed x-height...

any ideas?

brett
author: brett jordan
